verses.roman:
catur-bhuja mūrti dhari' āchena vasiyā
kṛṣṇa dekhi' gopī kahe nikaṭe āsiyā

synonyms: catur-bhuja—four-armed; mūrti—form; dhari'-accepting; āchena—was; vasiyā—sitting; kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; dekhi'-seeing; gopī—the gopīs; kahe—say; nikaṭe—nearby; āsiyā—coming there.
translation: Kṛṣṇa assumed His four-armed Nārāyaṇa form and sat there. When all the gopīs came, they looked at Him and spoke as follows.
